repo_description: A tool that generates a strongly typed client library for any GraphQL endpoint. The client allows writing GraphQL queries as plain JS objects (with type safety, awesome code completion experience, custom scalar type mapping, type guards and more)

schemas.name: scalarType.graphql
schemas.content:
scalar Custom

"single line description"
scalar CustomD

"""
multiline
description
"""
scalar CustomMD

type Query {
  int: Int
  float: Float
  string: String
  boolean: Boolean
  id: ID
}

schemas.name: unionType.graphql
unionType.graphql
enumType.graphql
schemas.content:
enum Enum {
  some
  other
  another
}

"single line description"
enum EnumD {
  "single line description"
  some
  other @deprecated
  "single line description"
  another @deprecated
}

"""
multiline
description
"""
enum EnumMD {
  """
  multiline
  description
  """
  some
  """
  multiline
  description
  """
  other @deprecated
}

type Query {
  _: Boolean
}

schemas.name: inputObjectType.graphql
schemas.content:
input InputF {
  value: Int!
  maybeValue: Int
  valueList: [Int!]!
  maybeValueList: [Int]!
  valueMaybeList: [Int!]
  maybeValueMaybeList: [Int]
  nested: [[[Int!]!]!]!
  maybeNested: [[[Int]]]
}

input Input {
  some: Int
  other: Int
  another: Int
}

"single line description"
input InputD {
  "single line description"
  another: Int
}

"""
multiline
description
"""
input InputMD {
  """
  multiline
  description
  """
  some: Int
}

type Query {
  _: Boolean
}

schemas.name: interfaceType.graphql
schemas.content:
interface InterfaceF {
  value: Int!
  maybeValue: Int
  valueList: [Int!]!
  maybeValueList: [Int]!
  valueMaybeList: [Int!]
  maybeValueMaybeList: [Int]
  nested: [[[Int!]!]!]!
  maybeNested: [[[Int]]]
}

interface Interface {
  some: Int
  other: Int
  another: Int
}

"single line description"
interface InterfaceD {
  some: Int @deprecated
  "single line description"
  other: Int
  "single line description"
  another: Int @deprecated
}

"""
multiline
description
"""
interface InterfaceMD {
  """
  multiline
  description
  """
  some: Int
  """
  multiline
  description
  """
  other: Int @deprecated
}

type Query {
  _: Boolean
}

schemas.name: objectType.graphql
schemas.content:
enum Enum {
  some
  other
}

interface Interface {
  noArgs: Boolean
  "single line description"
  other: Boolean @deprecated
}

"single line description"
type Object implements Interface {
  "single line description"
  noArgs: Boolean @deprecated
  other: Boolean
  optionalArg(optional: String): Boolean
  requiredArg("single line description" required: String!): Boolean
  optionalArgObj(optional: String): Interface
  requiredArgObj("single line description" required: Enum!): Interface
  argTypes(
    """
    multiline
    description
    """
    value: Int!
    "single line description"
    maybeValue: Int
    valueList: [Int!]!
    maybeValueList: [Int]!
    valueMaybeList: [Int!]
    maybeValueMaybeList: [Int]
    nested: [[[Int!]!]!]!
    maybeNested: [[[Int]]]
  ): Boolean
}

type InterfaceField {
  field: Interface!
}

type Query {
  _: Boolean
}

schemas.name: objectType.graphql
schemas.content:
type Object {
  scalar: String
  scalarOptionalArgs(arg: String): String
  scalarRequiredArgs(arg: String!): String

  object: Object
  objectOptionalArgs(arg: String): Object
  objectRequiredArgs(arg: String!): Object

  scalarList: [String]
  scalarListOptionalArgs(arg: String): [String]
  scalarListRequiredArgs(arg: String!): [String]

  objectList: [Object]
  objectListOptionalArgs(arg: String): [Object]
  objectListRequiredArgs(arg: String!): [Object]
}

type ObjectRequired {
  scalar: String!
  scalarOptionalArgs(arg: String): String!
  scalarRequiredArgs(arg: String!): String!

  object: Object!
  objectOptionalArgs(arg: String): Object!
  objectRequiredArgs(arg: String!): Object!

  scalarList: [String!]!
  scalarListOptionalArgs(arg: String): [String!]!
  scalarListRequiredArgs(arg: String!): [String!]!

  objectList: [Object!]!
  objectListOptionalArgs(arg: String): [Object!]!
  objectListRequiredArgs(arg: String!): [Object!]!
}

type Query {
  _: Boolean
}
